pages.title: Lignite
pages.text: Lignite is a form of natural Coal. A forge heated by Lignite can reach the White temperature without a Bellows to help.

pages.title: Bituminous Coal
pages.text: Bituminous Coal is a form of natural Coal. A forge heated by Bituminous Coal can reach the White temperature without a Bellows to help.

pages.title: Charcoal
pages.text: Charcoal is the main fuel source in TFC, created with the $(l:basic_smithing/charcoal_pit)charcoal pit$(). Without the aid of a Bellows, it can heat a forge to Yellow White**.

pages.title: Peat
pages.text: Peat is used to fuel campfires. It spawns in regions of high rainfall, and is immune to gravity.

pages.title: Logs
pages.text: Logs are used to fuel campfires. They have different burn temperatures.$(br2)Dark Red: Spruce, Willow$(br)Dark Red*: Aspen, Pine, Sequoia, Sycamore, White Cedar
Dark Red**: Acacia, Birch, Chestnut, Kapok, White Elm$(br)Dark Red***: Ash$(br)Dark Red****: Douglas Fir, Oak$(br)Bright Red: Hickory, Maple
